key_principles: Image-First: Text is secondary to high-quality visuals.
Softness: Rounded corners (xl/2xl), pill buttons, diffuse shadows.
Typography as Decor: Large, elegant serif headings.
anti_patterns: No dense grids (max 3-4 items per row).

primary.usage: Primary CTAs, soft backgrounds, hover states

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names

grid_system.bento_collections: Use asymmetric spans (col-span-2 row-span-2 for feature items)

buttons.primary: bg-pink-600 text-white hover:bg-pink-700 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-pink-200
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-pink-700 border border-pink-200 hover:bg-pink-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3
buttons.outline: border border-white text-white hover:bg-white hover:text-black rounded-full

navigation.style: sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-pink-100
navigation.links: font-manrope text-sm uppercase tracking-widest hover:text-pink-600 transition-colors

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. DELETE existing generic components if they conflict with this luxury aesthetic.
2. IMPLEMENT the 'Hero Section' first using the 'hero_main' image with a soft gradient overlay.
3. USE 'Playfair Display' for all headings. Do not use Sans-serif for titles.
4. ENSURE all product cards have a 'Quick Add' button that slides up on hover.
5. CREATE a 'Bento Grid' for the Featured Collections section using the provided images.
6. USE the 'gold' color for small accents like stars, discount badges, or thin borders.
7. DO NOT use standard gray borders. Use 'border-pink-100' or 'border-stone-100' for a softer look.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
